about.title: About LogicApp
about.content: LogicApp is a next-gen logistics provider offering customized solutions to streamline your supply chain operations. Our IT-driven platform integrates real-time tracking, predictive analytics, and automation to deliver smarter, faster, and more reliable logistics services. Whether you're managing local deliveries or global shipments, LogicApp helps reduce costs, increase transparency, and optimize resource utilization.
highlights: AI-powered route optimization and load planning
Real-time shipment tracking and predictive ETAs
Seamless API integrations with ERP and eCommerce platforms
Cloud-based dashboards and analytics for decision-making
